oosysteme

Class BaseCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • oosysteme.BaseCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManualControlCommand, PidChangeCommand, StrategyChangeCommand

    public abstract class BaseCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    BaseCommand implementation that all other commands should implement to reduce code for initialization.
